#
# EEGC globals
#
Precision           double      # Default numeric precision        
LargestMemoryChunk  100*10e6    # in bytes
Verbose             true        # Verbose mode on?
HeaderFileExt       .mat        # Default header file extension
DataFileExt         .eegc       # Default data file extension
SamplingRate        250         # Default sampling rate
DateFormat         dd-mmm-yyyy  # Default date format
TimeFormat         HH:MM:SS     # Default time format
ExportFileFormat   'eeglab'     # Default exporting file format
